biosecLogger.core

Enum UserLoggerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<UserLoggerManager>
      • biosecLogger.core.UserLoggerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<UserLoggerManager>

    public enum UserLoggerManager
extends java.lang.Enum<UserLoggerManager>
    UserLoggerManager is main controller to work with BiosecEvaluation. Creates new template, evaluates login with template. Handles logger, service and handles storage.
    Author:
    Stefan Smihla

      • loadUser

        private boolean loadUser(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         InvalidLoginException
        Loads user from internal storage into UserModel instance.
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        password - encrypted user's password
        Returns:
        true on success else false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - raises when file does not exist, or couldn't be read
        InvalidLoginException - raises when password does not match

      • encrypt

        private java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String password)
        Encrypt password with sha256 algorithm. This is used to store password.
        Parameters:
        password - plain password phrase
        Returns:
        encrypted password phrase

        Returns:

      • submitSample

        public int submitSample(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password)
                 throws ExistingUserException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        InvalidLoginException
        Submit new sample during registration.
        Parameters:
        username - name of new user
        password - password of new user
        Returns:
        CREATED, UPDATED or COMPLETED constant
        Throws:
        InvalidLoginException - raises when password does not match
        ExistingUserException - raises when user already exists in storage
        java.io.IOException - raises when new user couldn't be saved

      • saveTemplate

        private void saveTemplate()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Save template to internal (and optionally external) storage.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - raises when file couldn't be saved

      • resumeLogging

        public void resumeLogging()
        Continue with logging.

      • stopLogging

        public void stopLogging()
        Pause logging.

      • removeDataFiles

        public void removeDataFiles()
        Removes internal storage data.

      • checkExternalStorage

        public int checkExternalStorage()
        Checks if external storage is presented.
        Returns:
        actual state (WRITABLE, READABLE, UNMOUNTED)

      • submitUser

        public int submitUser(java.lang.String username,
             java.lang.String password)
               throws PatternMismatchException,
                      java.io.IOException,
                      InvalidLoginException
        Submits and evaluates user during login process.
        Parameters:
        username - name of the user
        password - password of the user
        Returns:
        CORRECT on success
        Throws:
        PatternMismatchException - raises when LoginEvalutor evaluates pattern mismatch
        InvalidLoginException - raises when passwords does not match
        java.io.IOException - raises when there is problem with read/write to file
